summary: Vessel behavior pattern: 'navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving northeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 56.1858 + 0.0009 × t, lon(t) ≈ 7.6360 + 0.00034 × t, where t is a normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)'
